title: Malayala Manorama
summary: Malayala Manorama is a morning newspaper in Malayalam published from Kottayam, Kerala, India by the Malayala Manorama Company Limited. Currently headed by Mammen Mathew; it was first published as a weekly on 22 March 1888, and currently has a readership of over 20 million (with a circulation base of over 2.4 million copies).[2][3] It is also the second oldest Malayalam newspaper in Kerala in circulation, after Deepika, which is also  published from Kottayam. Manorama also publishes an online edition.[4]
